title: Krev bloedzuigera
content:
Krev bloedzuigera – Krev získávaná z těl bloedzuigerů.

Cena
 Nákup	Prodej
2  	2  




Zdroje
Bahenní stvůry
Poznámky
The icon used above is from the Zápisy do Deníku for Krev bloedzuigera. It looks nothing like the inventory icon, shown here: 
Bloedzuiger remains will not contain this blood without their bestiary entry.
It is the first abundant source of Vermilion early in the game (the others being rare and expensive Fosfor or exotic Feainnewedd).
